END {"EventId":{"Id":20101,"Name":"Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command.CommandExecuted"},"ActionId":"5dfe5150-f8cb-4113-a2b8-3f300e538599","ActionName":"NoorCanvas.Controllers.HostController.CreateSessionWithTokens (NoorCanvas)","RequestId":"0HNFP3SHDSBN5:00000008","RequestPath":"/api/host/create-session","ConnectionId":"0HNFP3SHDSBN5"}
